attributes.action: arrange for a "raffle" for each constituency, with a prize of £1000, chosen at random from those who vote in the general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an incentive to encourage turnout.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or the Electoral Commission
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
